subject: United States Customs and Bord
body:
United States Customs and Border Protection,
1300 Pennsylvania Ave., NW,
Washington, DC 2022
This is to notify you about the latest development concerning all
package that are left in our custody, which yours are nclusive, In the
past you where given a bill of $500 usd in order to receive your
package of which we did not hear from you for sometime now and the
Diplomatic Courier who conveyed this  package to United States because
his visa has expired he left  for his country about a month ago.
Hence, The custom agency has decided to release all package to enable
all beneficiaries invest with their packagee  before next monrth 3rd
Of 2023 and we are now offering a Special BONUS to help all our
customers that are having their package  in  our custody. In order
words 
we are now requesting that  those involve should pay only the
sum of $50  to receive  their payment abandoned in our custody.
Further more you should be aware that we have scanned most of the
package and the scanned result of ten package shows united states
currency including yours while other  package contains family
treasures and documentations so you are  advise to use this
opportunity to receive your package  contains($20 million)
But remember that after (2DAYS) you did not make the payment then  we
will divert your package to Government treasury department,  Again
after (THREE DAYS) We will enter A new project for this year  which
will make it impossible for you to receive your fund in future  and
that is the reason why we decided to help all our customers  before we
enter into the new project.
Text me with this number.
+12675983562
Regard,
David Phillp

subject: Re: United States Customs and Bord
body:
Hello David,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the package that is currently in your custody. I appreciate the update and would like to know more about the special bonus you mentioned. Can you please provide me with some additional details?

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "abandoned in our custody"? I want to make sure I understand the situation correctly.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Earl
